short_summary: This is a contract for a elder to provide teachings, counseling, and ceremonial services to Indigenous offenders and institutional staff in the Ontario region. The contract is for 12 months, starting from December 2, 2024, with an option to renew for additional 4 periods of 12 months each. The estimated value of the contract is $427,157.64 (GST/HST extra).
description: This contract is for the provision of elder services for Indigenous offenders and institutional staff in the Ontario region. The successful company would provide teachings, counseling, and ceremonial services to the aforementioned populations. The contract is for a period of one year, starting from December 2, 2024, with an option to renew for an additional four periods of one year each. The estimated value of the contract is $427,157.64 (GST/HST extra). The contractor would work in partnership with the Correctional Service of Canada to deliver the programs outlined in this contract. Deliverables would include quarterly reports highlighting the progress and challenges faced by the contractor.
